name: Chapter II
tooltip:
Chapter II

Bring pages 10, 11, 14 and 16 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter II.

Requirements:
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 10
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 11
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 14
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 16
